org.matsim.core.utils.io

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matsim.core.utils.io.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends Object
    A class with some static utility functions for file-I/O.

    • Method Detail

      • getUrlFromFileOrResource

        public static URL getUrlFromFileOrResource(String filename)

      • getBufferedReader

        public static BufferedReader getBufferedReader(String filename)
                                        throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for reading and returns a BufferedReader for it. Supports gzip-compressed files, such files are automatically decompressed. If the file is not found, a gzip-compressed version of the file with the added ending ".gz" will be searched for and used if found. Assumes that the text in the file is stored in UTF-8 (without BOM).
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to read, may contain the ending ".gz" to force reading a compressed file.
        Returns:
        BufferedReader for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException -
        author mrieser

      • getBufferedReader

        public static BufferedReader getBufferedReader(String filename,
                                               Charset charset)
                                        throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for reading and returns a BufferedReader for it. Supports gzip-compressed files, such files are automatically decompressed. If the file is not found, a gzip-compressed version of the file with the added ending ".gz" will be searched for and used if found.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to read, may contain the ending ".gz" to force reading a compressed file.
        charset - the Charset of the file to read
        Returns:
        BufferedReader for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException -
        author mrieser

      • getBufferedWriter

        public static BufferedWriter getBufferedWriter(String filename,
                                               boolean useCompression)
                                        throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for writing and returns a BufferedWriter for it. Supports gzip-compression of the written data. The filename may contain the ending ".gz". If no compression is to be used, the ending will be removed from the filename. If compression is to be used and the filename does not yet have the ending ".gz", the ending will be added to it.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename where to write the data.
        useCompression - whether the file should be gzip-compressed or not.
        Returns:
        BufferedWriter for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • getBufferedWriter

        public static BufferedWriter getBufferedWriter(String filename)
                                        throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for writing and returns a BufferedWriter for it. If the filename ends with ".gz", data will be automatically gzip-compressed. The data written will be encoded as UTF-8 (only relevant if you use Umlauts or other characters not used in plain English).
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename where to write the data.
        Returns:
        BufferedWriter for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • getAppendingBufferedWriter

        public static BufferedWriter getAppendingBufferedWriter(String filename)
                                                 throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for writing and returns a BufferedWriter for it. If the filename ends with ".gz", data will be automatically gzip-compressed. The data written will be encoded as UTF-8 (only relevant if you use Umlauts or other characters not used in plain English). If the file already exists, content will not be overwritten, but new content be appended to the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename where to write the data.
        Returns:
        BufferedWriter for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • getBufferedWriter

        public static BufferedWriter getBufferedWriter(String filename,
                                               Charset charset)
                                        throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for writing and returns a BufferedWriter for it. If the filename ends with ".gz", data will be automatically gzip-compressed.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename where to write the data.
        charset - the encoding to use to write the file.
        Returns:
        BufferedWriter for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • getAppendingBufferedWriter

        public static BufferedWriter getAppendingBufferedWriter(String filename,
                                                        Charset charset)
                                                 throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for writing and returns a BufferedWriter for it. If the filename ends with ".gz", data will be automatically gzip-compressed. If the file already exists, content will not be overwritten, but new content be appended to the file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename where to write the data.
        charset - the encoding to use to write the file.
        Returns:
        BufferedWriter for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • getBufferedWriter

        public static BufferedWriter getBufferedWriter(String filename,
                                               Charset charset,
                                               boolean append)
                                        throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for writing and returns a BufferedWriter for it. If the filename ends with ".gz", data will be automatically gzip-compressed.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename where to write the data.
        charset - the encoding to use to write the file.
        append - true if the file should be opened for appending, instead of overwriting
        Returns:
        BufferedWriter for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • copyStream

        public static void copyStream(InputStream fromStream,
                              OutputStream toStream)
                       throws IOException
        Copies the content from one stream to another stream.
        Parameters:
        fromStream - The stream containing the data to be copied
        toStream - The stream the data should be written to
        Throws:
        IOException -
        author mrieser

      • deleteDirectoryRecursively

        public static void deleteDirectoryRecursively(Path path)
                                       throws UncheckedIOException
        Deletes a directory tree recursively. Should behave like rm -rf, i.e. there should not be any accidents like following symbolic links.
        Parameters:
        path - The directoy to be deleted
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • getInputStream

        public static InputStream getInputStream(String filename)
                                  throws UncheckedIOException
        Tries to open the specified file for reading and returns an InputStream for it. Supports gzip-compressed files, such files are automatically decompressed. If the file is not found, a gzip-compressed version of the file with the added ending ".gz" will be searched for and used if found.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to read, may contain the ending ".gz" to force reading a compressed file.
        Returns:
        InputStream for the specified file.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException -
        author dgrether

      • getInputStream

        public static InputStream getInputStream(URL url)
                                  throws UncheckedIOException
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException

      • getOutputStream

        public static OutputStream getOutputStream(String filename)
                                    throws UncheckedIOException
        Returns a buffered and optionally gzip-compressed output stream to the specified file. If the given filename ends with ".gz", the written file content will be automatically compressed with the gzip-algorithm.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if the file cannot be created.
        author mrieser

      • getPrintStream

        public static PrintStream getPrintStream(String filename)
        Copy of getOutputStream and then changed to correspond to the PrintStream signature. Device to hopefully reduce FindBugs warnings. kai, may'17
        Parameters:
        filename -
        Returns:
